descriptions.tetra: Tetra is the leader of a band of pirates who roam the Great Sea. These salty scalawags help Link throughout his entire journey.
descriptions.ganondorf: The main vilan which is freed from an external prison. His main task is to search for a young girl who may hold the power to change the entire world.
descriptions.foes: This relentless guardian called Gohdan tests the heroes courage.
descriptions.waker: The Wind Waker casts musical spells to do multiple things such as change the wind's direction and affect the whole world in the most mysterious ways!
